pages.text: Lets get started creating our very first rocket. A rocket made of wood! We will need some items: $(li) Wood (any variant)$(li) Gunpowder $(li) Iron Ingot $(br2)Once you have collected all these items, we can create a wooden rocket, similar to our bamboo rocket. The recipes are on the right hand side.
$(br2)After you have all these items in your inventory, you can arrange them as shown to create a basic wooden rocket.
